repository.description: Aurochs is a parser generator that uses the parse expression grammar (PEG) or "packrat" approach. It takes a grammar in a BNF-like notation (a .peg file) and produces bytecode (a .nog file) for a stack automaton. This bytecode is later interpreted on the input to parse using a C library. Bindings are given for Ocaml, Java and Exascript.
repository.name: aurochs
